duties_responsibilities.duty: Retain business customers through solution-based selling and account management via telephone.
Make outbound calls to achieve sales quota metrics.
Prepare sales documentation, activity reports, and proposals for customers.
Develop customer relationships and drive both sales growth and account retention.
Document conversations and contact information into client management system.
Work with customers to minimize downgrading or leaving.
Function in a closely monitored environment and work nights, weekends, and overtime as necessary.
